name: frozenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without moving or showing any emotion: He stared ahead frozenly as the jurors each confirmed the guilty verdict. She smiled frozenly, as if to remind him that they were no longer close.
More examplesFewer examplesHis photographs depict animals frozenly waiting, as if to pounce on unsuspecting prey."I told you," she said frozenly. "There has been no one else since you."The two sides have been staring frozenly at each other for years.
